name: ads-finder-pro
description: Professional Facebook Ads Finder - TypeScript Monolith

scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && npm run typecheck && cd ../frontend && npm run typecheck
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
